page.title: 08Recreation and Employment
page.content: Local employment opportunities are limited to the agricultural sector but the following list gives a picture of the types of other employment which the local population are engaged in:- Motor mechanic Builder and chimney sweep Smallholder Shopkeeper Range Warden (Min. of Defence) Jeweller (Darlington) Teacher (Darlington) Teacher (Stockton on Tees) Journalist Archaeologist (Durham University) Civil Servant (Catterick Garrison) Airman (Royal Air Force) Draughtsman Nurse Merchant Navy (3 people) Corn Mill and a Sawmill worker Publican
